model-value.desc: Model of the component defining shown/hidden state; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive

overlay.desc: Puts drawer into overlay mode (does not occupy space on screen, narrowing the page)

mini-width.desc: Width of drawer (in pixels) when in mini mode

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

mini-to-overlay.desc: Mini mode will expand as an overlay

breakpoint.desc: Breakpoint (in pixels) of layout width up to which mobile mode is used

behavior.desc: Overrides the default dynamic mode into which the drawer is put on

bordered.desc: Applies a default border to the component

elevated.desc: Adds a default shadow to the header

persistent.desc: Prevents drawer from auto-closing when app's route changes

show-if-above.desc: Forces drawer to be shown on screen on initial render if the layout width is above breakpoint, regardless of v-model; This is the default behavior when SSR is taken over by client on initial render

no-swipe-open.desc: Disables the default behavior where drawer can be swiped into view; Useful for iOS platforms where it might interfere with Safari's 'swipe to go to previous/next page' feature

no-swipe-close.desc: Disables the default behavior where drawer can be swiped out of view (applies to drawer content only); Useful for iOS platforms where it might interfere with Safari's 'swipe to go to previous/next page' feature

no-swipe-backdrop.desc: Disables the default behavior where drawer backdrop can be swiped

default.desc: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component (overridden by 'mini' slot if used and drawer is in mini mode)

mini.desc: Content to show when in mini mode (overrides 'default' slot)

update:model-value.desc: Emitted when showing/hidden state changes; Is also used by v-model

show.desc: Emitted after component has triggered show()

before-show.desc: Emitted when component triggers show() but before it finishes doing it

hide.desc: Emitted after component has triggered hide()

before-hide.desc: Emitted when component triggers hide() but before it finishes doing it

on-layout.desc: Emitted when drawer toggles between occupying space on page or not

click.desc: Emitted when user clicks/taps on the component and drawer is NOT in mobile mode; Useful for when taking a decision to toggle mini mode

mouseover.desc: Emitted when user moves mouse cursor over the component and drawer is NOT in mobile mode; Useful for when taking a decision to toggle mini mode

mouseout.desc: Emitted when user moves mouse cursor out of the component and drawer is NOT in mobile mode; Useful for when taking a decision to toggle mini mode

mini-state.desc: Emitted when drawer changes the mini-mode state (sometimes it is forced to do so)

toggle.desc: Triggers component to toggle between show/hide
